nodes.text: An e-nursery retail website that integrates clustering algorithms for recommendations and visual data representation will enhance user experience and optimize business operations for plant nurseries
Collect comprehensive datasets including plant catalog information, customer registration data, purchase history, search activity, and product feedback to enable personalization and analytics

Implement a personalized recommendation system by preparing cleaned data and applying clustering algorithms (for example K-means or hierarchical clustering) to group users with similar preferences and behaviors

Provide visual data representation by integrating visualization tools (Tableau and Matplotlib) with the project database to create interactive dashboards showing metrics like sales trends, customer demographics, and product popularity

Design standard e-commerce components (secure login and registration, shopping cart with real-time product availability, checkout, and secure payment gateway integration) to support functionality of the e-nursery platform
Assume availability of sufficiently detailed plant and user data (attributes, demographics, purchase and search histories, and feedback) to support clustering and visualization
Use collected product feedback and ratings as evidence to infer customer preferences and to evaluate recommendation relevance
Group users into clusters based on similarity in preferences and behaviors, then generate product suggestions for users based on their cluster membership
Clustering-based recommendations can be implemented using K-means or hierarchical clustering as practical algorithms cited in literature and the project
Interactive dashboards enable stakeholders to explore data via filters and drill-downs, improving insight into trends and informing inventory and marketing decisions
Standard e-commerce features and secure payment gateways provide necessary infrastructure to support online nursery sales and reduce transaction friction
Result example: the implemented recommendation page suggested Aloe vera to a user who had added Piper Betel Maghal, demonstrating a working personalized suggestion based on user history
Visualization using Matplotlib and Tableau was integrated and GUI screenshots were produced showing dashboards and site interfaces as outputs of the implementation

Conclusion: Integrating clustering algorithms and visual data representation yields a user-friendly e-nursery platform that improves product discovery, supports informed decision making, and enhances business efficiency
Limitation: Effectiveness of clustering recommendations depends on data quality, algorithm parameters, and may face cold-start or sparsity issues noted in related literature
